title: Figma Trigger (Beta)
description: Starts the workflow when Figma events occur

teamId.description: Trigger will monitor this Figma Team for changes. Team ID can be found in the URL of a Figma Team page when viewed in a web browser: figma.com/files/team/{TEAM-ID}/.

x-enumDescriptions: Triggers when someone comments on a file
Triggers whenever a file has been deleted. Does not trigger on all files within a folder, if the folder is deleted.
Triggers whenever a file saves or is deleted. This occurs whenever a file is closed or within 30 seconds after changes have been made.
Triggers whenever a named version is created in the version history of a file
Triggers whenever a library file is published
